subject: HOTH 9 Date
body: HOTH 9 is starting on Saturday, February 26!

subject: HOTH 9 Location
body: In-person HOTH will take place in Covel Grand Horizon. Online participants should join our Hack Discord server!

subject: HOTH 9 Applications
body: Applications for HOTH 9 are now open! Access the application form from the home page.
